en.target_name: Strengthen the implementation of the World Health Organization Framework Convention on Tobacco Control in all countries, as appropriate
en.computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
en.indicator_name: Age-standardized prevalence of current tobacco use among persons aged 15 years and older
en.indicator_definition: The percentage of population aged 19 years and over who have ever consumed five packs of tobacco or more and currently use any tobacco product
en.statistics_name: Korea National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey
en.computation_calculations: Survey of nationwide household members aged 19 and over
en.global_indicator_name: Age-standardized prevalence of current tobacco use among persons aged 15 years and older
en.source_organisation_1: Health and Nutrition Examination Survey Division, Korea Disease Control and Prevention Agency
en.title: Untitled
